hero.subtitle: A beautiful village nestled in the heart of Indonesia, where tradition meets modernity and community thrives in harmony with nature.

welcome.title: Welcome to Our Community
welcome.message: Butuh Kidul Village is a vibrant community that values tradition, embraces progress, and welcomes visitors with open arms. Discover our rich cultural heritage, natural beauty, and the warm hospitality of our people.

history.title: Our Village History
history.subtitle: Explore the rich heritage and stories that shaped our community through the years.
history.default_message: Discover the rich history and heritage of our village, passed down through generations.
history.no_history: No history entries available at the moment.
history.meta_description: Explore the rich history and heritage of Butuh Kidul Village.

articles.title: Latest Articles
articles.subtitle: Stay updated with news and stories from our community

sample1.title: Village Infrastructure Development
sample1.description: Learn about the latest infrastructure improvements and development projects that are enhancing the quality of life for our residents.

sample2.title: Environmental Conservation Efforts
sample2.description: Discover our community's ongoing initiatives to protect and preserve the natural environment for future generations.

sample3.title: Community Events and Celebrations
sample3.description: Join us in celebrating our rich cultural traditions through various community events and festivals throughout the year.

community.title: Strong Community
community.description: A close-knit community that values tradition, cooperation, and mutual support in daily life.

environment.title: Natural Beauty
environment.description: Surrounded by lush landscapes and committed to environmental preservation and sustainability.

services.title: Village Services
services.description: Comprehensive public services and facilities to support the needs of our residents.

umkm.subtitle: Discover the various business units and community organizations that drive our local economy and social development
